a language spoken in southern India: The people of Kerala speak Malayalam. In Malayalam this vegetable is called Koorkai.

in or of the Malayalam language: Adaka is the Malayalam name for the areca nut palm. Her life is portrayed in the Malayalam novel Francis Itty Cora.
